content.detailedDescription:
We were out walking around 7 :30 and heading home on our street.  going from west to east.  we observed 5 or 6 bright lights in close formation.  we thought it was odd on how they were moving.  then two more objects also appeared to follow the other objects.  each object disappeared.  they came out of the horizon from the newport beach area. most likely these objects were over the ocean.  first we  thought it was something from vandenburg. but vandenburg is to the the north.  these objects were from the south.  from the horizon to about 80 degrees and then disappeared.  about one minute later, a small white circular object appeared and moved from south to north and went from about 60 degrees to the horizon where we lost it.  usually we can find out what happens by searching on the internet or local news.  but nothing so far.  we just would like to know what these were.  we think they may have been small rockets since we saw one of them do a flare out as it was about 80 degrees over the horizon.  could you find out what these were?  we are just curious 

thank you.  i hope others saw this two.  it was really easy to see and odd that they disappeared.
content.summary: Lights going up over ocean. disappeared.  then about a minute later a white circular object

content.detailedDescription:
While traveling west on dana road, taking my mother-in-law home from thanksgiving dinner, i was looking at how bright venus was in the night sky.  i noticed three lights in a triangular pattern.  two were about the same elevation above the ground and one higher than the other two.  they were traveling west to east and moving fairly fast.  i first thought i was looking at airplanes and then i realized that they were steady orange lights that were not blinking.  i could see stars between the lights and they were also too close together to be commercial airplanes.  i actually said out loud, what the hell is that.  my 12 year old daughter then started watching them too.  

we continued watching them for about five minutes until we turned on tracy grove road and lost sight of them behind the trees.  one of the lights disappeared before we lost sight of the other two behind the trees.  it just seemed to vanish.

after dropping my mother-in-law off at her apartment, near the corner of those two roads, we went back home traveling in the opposite direction on the same roads and never saw the lights again.  we looked for them and my daughter talked about it all the way home.  she actually said she was a little scared.  i have never seen anything before that i could not easily explain as an airplane or a satellite and i would just like to know what we saw tonight.
content.summary: Three orange lights over hendersonville

content.detailedDescription: I was driving two high school age children home after school on 11/14/13 when we noticed several objects hovering at a height of 1/2 a mile to maybe 1 mile? if there had only been one in the sky, one could have mistaken it for an airplane or jet, possibly a balloon or helicopter...It became very clear to us however, whatever we were looking at were both reflecting off the sun and hovering in formation for approx. 10 minutes before slowly flying away in the direction of big bear and at a slow ascent until they could no longer be seen with the naked eye; at first i tried coming up with explanations, asking the kids if they could be small clouds or possibly jets. they definately weren't birds or balloons. they simply were just unidentifiable, no explanation! i noticed that several cars had pulled over and were watching the same thing, so i decided to pull over as well at which time another car parked in front of me to view the objects. we took some pictures using an ipod before the objects started flying away. we tried taking a video, but couldn't get the objects into focus. funny thing is i've seen ufos before, but never had witnesses with me, so now my ufo stories don't seem so crazy. i now don't go anywhere without my camera, video camera and binoculars, i'll be ready next time!
content.summary: 5-7 objects reflecting the sun and hovering before ascending in direction of big bear

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure i should send this, but am a little freaked out right now. i am in memphis, tn, i was just out in my backyard taking my dog out and i swear i saw something i can not explain! i have no evidence or other witness, but i swear i just saw at about 10:20pm a ring of lights that seemed to be in a fog, they turned from horizontal to vertical, first headed east, then when they turned vertical, they went north across the sky. they seemed to be in a fog, or a mist....If i hadn't looked at the right moment, i would have missed them....I can not believe i am sitting here on thanksgiving night having just seen something so crazy! i am not asking you to believe me, just please please tell me if you hear a similar report from anybody else!
content.summary: I saw a oval disc shape with a row of lights that pulsed or blinked all in a fig or mist that changed direction and from horizontal to vertical

content.detailedDescription:
I was inside working on the computer when my mother came into the room and said i had to come outside to see this strange light. i noticed it was the only bright object in the sky. the skies were clear at the time. the time was about 6:55 pm mnt 
i grabbed my phone and turned on google sky map. there was nothing there but a constellation. at first i thought it might be a plane. my naked eye saw one big white bright light. but it never moved. it seemed as if it was hovering or staying in place. so i thought maybe it might have been moving away from me to make it appear it was staying still. i grabbed my camera and started to take still pictures. then i made a video and zoomed in. the weird thing was to my naked eye it looked like a white light. i'm guessing it was 5-10 miles way from me. but i'm really not sure. when looking through the video, there were all kinds of colors coming from it. but i didn't see the colors with just my eyes. on the video it was changing colors. blue, red, orange, purple, white.

i remembered where i was standing and waited to see if it moved. for maybe 5 mins it was in place then it either moved further away or was descending. eventually it went below my viewing eyesight. 

when i first saw the object. it looked like one white light. 15 mins before i lost sight. there were at least 3 objects. the middle one was on top. i closed one eye ad looked. then another eye and looked. the other witness said they also saw 3 lights and not just one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light in the sky that caught our eye

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog out. the dog started whimpering and wanted to come back in the house. so i sat with him on the porch and waited for him to calm down. he was looking into the sky. it was then i noticed 6 lights flying across the sky. they were a yellowish orange color. they moved fast and were silent. they moved in a straight line going east. they were far apart from each other and traveled at the same ratecof speed. i stared at the first one til it wad out of sight. i ran in the housecto get my boyfriend. he came out only to see the last 3 travel off into the distance. he couldnt explain it either. we both agreed those could not have been planes. they just seemed to move too fast and they were dead quiet.
content.summary: 6 yellow orange lights in a row moving fast across the sky. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: We were outside watching the stars when all of a sudden the stars started disappearing and reappearing on this object. it had no doubt a cloaking device and as it hovered above our heads the ufo started off slow and then flew fast into the distance. the ufo was a boomerang that kind of resembled the phoenix lights.
content.summary: Rectangle ufo with a cloaking device flew directly over me

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished work at 1930 and was headed to the hockey arena to pick up my oldest daughter and my son . my thoughts were busy from the day's events and what i still had to do before going to bed. i pulled into the parking lot and sent my husband a text to let him know i was there and to send the kids out as he was staying with our other daughter at the rink. i was watching for my kids and when they came out i noted that my 2 year old son was without a hat. i looked up to see the temperature gage to check the outside temp when in the corner of my eye i saw what i thought was a shooting star. i expected it to disappear but as it got closer it got larger and slower than a shooting star. when i was staring at it straight on i could see a blue ball the size of the harvest moon. it was bright and glowing. blue to lighter blue then surrounded by white light. as it was exiting my field of vision i could see what i thought maybe a trail or tail. i am not sure about that. but in front of the ball the sky was brighter than behind it. the object then disappeared over the tree tops. i heard no noise. i looked around my daughter was buckling my son in his car seat and there wasn't another person in the parking lot. i am convinced someone else in the city had to have seen it. the object was too large for only me to have seen it. at that moment i felt like this experience was to extraordinary to not be shared.
content.summary: Not sure what i saw. took me so off guard. especially after hearing about something similar in montreal only 2 days ago.

content.detailedDescription: A bright light emitting object was observed flying at tree top level, ecessive speed and course change was observed.
content.summary: A bright light emitting round object, observed flying at tree level with excessive speed and direction change to flight path.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my family driving south on 59 in new caney and as we were nearing the exit we spotted a square shaped object just above the top of the trees that appeared stationary (hard to tell since we were moving). the object had three red lights in a row across the bottom that flashed one after another repeatedly. on each of the four corners there were solid white lights. my sister who was next to me was also able to get a good look, and admitted to not having an explanation, even though she is highly skeptical. my dad was driving and pulled over but at this point the trees were in the way.
content.summary: Square shaped objects with three red lights on bottom and white light on each corner

content.detailedDescription:
I just went outside and noticed object in the sky. i went and got my family to come outside and look. i went and got my phone with no minutes but the camera still works. i was able to get 3 pictures- i will buy minutes soon and send the pictures to you guys. these are the first pictures i have ever taken before. i talked my son into also taking pictures and attempt to put them with his report. my family cannot stand me even taking an interest in this matter. the fact is i am the victim of alien abduction. i was taken back in sept-2006 en-route to work for us customs and border patrol in montana. no-one would believe me!! i take care of myself and make reports with you guys when i sight something. this is major tonight. i have noticed something that looked the same following me for the last 2 weeks. i know when these beings are in the area!! they are here. i am not afraid- im thinking they are just doing the usual and just keeping track of where im at. i dont think they are going to come down. these beings can beam down from the sky- but hopefully they want. the issue that bothers me a little is the red solid something i saw beside of the really bright starlike object. the starlike is not a star- it may be a satelite- i will check the internet when possible- could be a planet? 
jet flew by- in the area
content.shape: Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: I went outside and just noticed - my son and i got pictures- he attempted to send them, and also may have created a report. my family gets upset with me every time i even talk about ufo or what has happen to me. i do not understand why?

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside with binoculars. originally saw a star in the shape of a cross, and went out to look.  saw about 7 spacecrafts moving through the sky interdimensionally.  then a spacecraft flew over my house heading south barely over my treetops over powerlines.  my electrical box is blinking words and numbers.  a number of artifacts all around my house.  including grass creased as in a crop circle.

there were at least 6 stars that were starships and each one i viewed with binoculars moved when i looked at them, squiggled and danced in the sky and would shoot off in various directions.

i feel disoriented.  my house is definitely affected by an electromagnetic field.  dizzy and feel pulled in different parts of the yard.  a friend came over and took photos and she felt the magnetic fields as well.

i watched these starships off and on from 12:00 midnight until 6 a.M. in the morning.  the starship that flew over the treetops came over me.  it looked like an organic being, with two bright oblong lights beneath it.  it twisted as it flew, and flew south and vanished in seconds.

can someone come out and investigate with equipment the electromagnetic fields right away??
i think this warrants a visit, rather than just submitting information.  if you cannot, is there someone who can?  thank you.
content.summary: I saw multiple starships in the sky, and one flew over me and over treetops

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and noticed this huge light orb in the sky brighter than a star
content.summary: Large orb of light in sky brighter than star

content.detailedDescription: Over several years (i first saw it in august 2001) i've seen objects in the sky that first appeared as stars (no movment visible) until these objects started to move until with direction changes until the went over the horizon. within a second these objects accelerated to a speed that was  way faster than the iss passing by. i've seen the mir, the iss and several salelites and i've never seen any of them standing still and then accelerating this fast, even making changes in direction.
content.summary: Several sightings of "moving stars"

content.detailedDescription: It was around 8 am, the sky was clear and i looked out of our kitchen window while i was making breakfast. i discovered a cigar-shaped object that was flying way faster than planes would do (we have 3 airports around and it didn't look like a human made aircraft). the object was brightly glowing and there were no wings, positioning lights, turbines etc. visible and it didn't leave any trails in the sky. moreover i opened the window but couldn't hear anything but the usual sounds of the city, but no planelike sounds or anything that could have come from the object.
content.summary: Cigar-shaped brighty glowing object flying from nw to sw

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west towards j���lich when i saw a silver ball in the sky. the ball flew at very high speed, leaving no trails or similar things in the sky.There were no positioning lights, wings, propellers, turbines etc. visible. i could follow it for a few minutes as it flew into the same direction until i lost it. when i reached the street leading from welldorf to stetternich i discovered a strange phenomenon in the clouds (on the western side of the street). close to a water tower there was a rectangular patch in the clouds which was colored like a rainbow. there was no rain and nothing else of a rainbow visible, only this patch in the clouds. (it does not necesseraly mean that both things relate to each other, but the ball flew towards this patch)
content.summary: Silver ball flying at very high speed

content.detailedDescription: It was just hovering. thought maybe it was venus. then it was gone. it reappeared in front of us and flew past us.  there was a glowing blue green light.  an 18 wheeler and 2 other cars came to a screeching hault. then it was gone.
content.summary: Hovering then flew past us.  was glowing.  cars stopped in middle of highway.

content.detailedDescription: I was off of lamar street in south austin on saturday, october 19, in the parking lot of the one 2 one bar, and i was looking east.  it was about 11:20pm.  i looked up and noticed noticed 6 or 7 red balls flying in "formation" heading up at the same trajectory and blinking in unison at times.  it took me about 15 seconds to get my phone and start filming.  there was no sound coming from the objects.  they continued to rise until they all disappeared out of sight.  rather, they all quit blinking at the same time.  i would have continued filming longer but my phones memory was full.  i have never believed in ufos, but i truly do not have an explanation for what i saw that night.
content.summary: I have never seen anything like the lights i observed that night.  please see video.

content.detailedDescription:
they started to update their site - "new technology that allowed them to do all sorts﻿ of stuff." "besides producing medical inventions, also has divisions for automotive, home, electronics, apparel and software inventions." note "corporate offices: 18101 von karman ave, irvine, ca 92612 laboratory: undisclosed location " ?!

"stan petrov is a medical student/inventor who has distinguished himself by his abilities in electronics, mechanics, and repair of medical instruments. stan moved to the usa at 20, unable to speak english and without living family. only ten years later, stan is an american citizen, has gained a degree in biology, is in medical school, has submitted several articles to professional peer-reviewed journals, acted as a consultant to a biomedical device company, has been approached by another company wanting to develop and use one of his inventions, and has taught biomechanical and surgical techniques to physicians and professors. 

at the beginning of his third year in medical school, stan started a company to develop and market his first major medical invention, but when the stream of inventions continued to flow, it became necessary to start inovatzia, inc. which, besides producing medical inventions, also has divisions for automotive, home, electronics, apparel and software inventions." 

"inovatzia��� inc. is a company centered around the inventions of stan c petrov, a medical student, political asylee, and american citizen. inspired by nikola tesla, stan has created a world where control of medical equipment, household appliances, automobiles, and even footwear is accessible and customizable 

'i saw them playing with a working prototype over a year ago ��� not exactly as the one described in the video. 



they had developed new technology that allowed them to do all sorts﻿ of stuff. 

the name of the inventor is stan petrov, and his companies are inteli, corp. and inovatzia. 
they are very secretive company and until recently wouldn���t update their web sites. 

however if you doubt it ��� give them a call pretending you are looking for a job as software or hardware engineer."
login
content.summary: They are already here on earth!

content.detailedDescription: En el mes de febrero de 1976 descendio en el campo, cerca se la ciudad de salto , uruguay,un ovni, posandose sobre un arbol(ombu),partiendolo e hizo en el mismo un pozo muy profundo,inutilizando un motor electrico,  matando a un toro ,un perro y produciendo quemaduras en el brazo al due���o del campo,dejando circulos en el suelo, y signos .-aun hoy se siguen viendo luces y naves en la zona.(ciudad de salto, uruguay, a orillas del rio uruguay, zona de termas de dayman.-)
content.summary: Partio un ombu en 2 e hizo un pozo profundo,etc

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back from lawton and heading west i noticed a very very bright light in the sky to the south i would say about 10 to 10:30 in the sky,the time i seen it was approx. 6 pm just as it was getting dusk. it went down as the moon would from east to west. the next night my room mate came in and said there is a very bright thing in the sky. i told him about seeing it last night. we both do not think it is in space,seems to be in out atmosphere. i watch the sky's and have reported the things i see but no one wil come and let me show them. i doubt i get any response on this either
content.summary: Very bright light that is not a planet or star

content.detailedDescription:
Ventura county, heading northbound on the i101 past calabasas approximately 6-7pm november 25th is when i notice the ���so���.

it is low, low enough that its relative location changes subtly as i drive north at 72mph ~
it is extremely bright, as bright as the moon at least, although much closer to earth. it appears to hover ��� unlike a plane, it exhibits no evidence of perpetual motion. it has a vaguely diamond shape, but the point of the diamond is towards the sky and ground.

hence
^
v
not

< >

i am so fascinated by it that i unwisely use my phone to take a picture of it while trying avoid swerving.







they are not great. i get home and the object is still in the skyline, southwesterly from my location. i pull my mother outside to show her the oddity. she is astounded , agreeing that it is not a plane, a star, a planet, the moon.

the object has an extraordinary coloring, psychedelic even. a prism of triangular light emanates from it, the colors divided into spectral beams, not blurred. blue, red, and green are the visible colors, they shift in shape and luminosity. we spend half an hour trying to capture the phenomenon on camera, but any picture we took distorted the object completely, turning it into a pure globe of white light.





even more odd, while holding the camera still, the white light wiggled around the screen like a worm or a prokaryotic organism, even though the object was completely still off the camera. in total fascination, me and my mother tested this over and over, but it remained true. i will get the footage we captured uploaded within the next day or two.

eventually after staring for well over an hour at the extremely bright blue/green/red triangular low hovering object, i went inside to see if i could find any other witness accounts, or nasa information of sky events that might account for what i saw. i couldn���t find anything.

although the ���so��� appeared to be unmoving, it was moving, but at a speed so slow you would have to stand and cup your hands around your eyes to see the object pass out of your visibility range.

after a few hours it couldn���t be seen from our house in thousand oaks (ventura county, due north of los angeles). however, i happened to find myself on the freeway 101 heading south at about 9:45pm. passing calabasas, i saw it again, but now on the opposite side of the freeway. it had been to my right when i was northbound, and it was to my right driving southbound four hours later. it seemed to have traveled in a u

>������������������������������>|
                                     v
<������������������������������<|

i am bewildered and perplexed. it is probable this account will not be read, and if read, will be dismissed, which is fine. i have documented what i have seen, it is here for the inclined. i have borne witness, i do not presume to understand.
content.summary: Strange object hovering bright as the moon but far closer to earth

content.detailedDescription:
i woke up about 6:40 am because of mother nature call and i decided to go out and get the paper and in doing so i looked up in the sky like i always do and it is crisp and beautiful clear morning and i noticed an orb and the object that was pure white in the east south eastern sky.  i took a second look at it right quick and as i did within a few seconds it disappeared like shutting off a light bulb.  the whole event lasted about 6 seconds and it is the exactly the same thing i saw in utah in june of this year.  the object was about 45���and looked approximately 12-15 thousand feet and the size was about an eighth of an inch. the distance from me would be about 15 miles and that would be the western side of sugarland. it was traveling east south east when i first saw it and when it disappeared.  i���m going to put in a picture of the one that i took in utah in june of 2013 and this one is exactly like it.
     i���m a field investigator with mufon and state section director and retired as well.
     i up loaded 2 photos the original and a color code change and this is very real.
content.summary: Went out to get the paper and saw a white object in the eastern sky.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Far to much to list i have called mufon twice asked to get investigators out to my location. since 9pm october 27th i have brought dozens of witnesses including law enforcement to watch craft come out of the water, space and within our atmosphere. we have witnessed on 2 occasions 2 different entity types and had hd cameras rolling for all events! i have hours of hd video and after the past month i can read through mufon reports and tell you a few other reports people made i have seen with my own eyes. please call me after 8pm or before 11:30am mon-fri or anytime on weekends. you will not be dissapointed!
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Since oct. 27th multiple ufo, uso and entity

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 5:21am on november 27, i witnessed what i thought was a star that just seems to dim every time i have looked at it. i now feel this is beyond anything i actually know of. this 'object', for lack of a better term, was in place nearly perfect north and glowing yellow-orange. when i looked up at this object, i actually said (and feel crazy for even including this) "there you are again". after saying this, it dimmed as it has twice before and stayed at it's then new level of brightness. the difference now that drives me to post this event is i was now able to see this thing move. after it had dimmed, i noticed for the fist time something identical to it's level of light down and slightly to the right of this object. at the beginning of this event, they were not sharing the same level of light so the object below the first noticed item was at the same level it was before the object above started to dim to the same level of light. once the brighter object dimmed, they began to move in unison holding the same distance between the each other and headed down and north east to below the visible horizon. as i had nothing but my phone on hand, i was unable to capture any images of this event but swear on my life this took place. i have included a screen capture from a star map app on my ipad mini since i had to know if there was anything present in that spot in the sky. when placing the ipad in the area with the app running, and adjusting the visible stars to a little higher than what i was actually seeing in the sky, the two objects were not recorded. the only star that actually showed was kochab (beta ursae minoris). i do not know if this app updates in real time but the two objects i saw were not there when searching the area in which they were seen. 

i should note that as i have mentioned seeing the glowing 'orb' twice before, i was at work and outside. it had been hazy each time before but it was obvious that the most visible object was there and dimming to almost nothing. i was unable to see the object move unlike today when seeing them in a perfectly clear night sky. 

this is about all the detail i can give right now but if there are any questions, i am sure i will know.
content.summary: Third times the charm

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving from hartford, ct. toward springfield, ma. on interstate 91 about 1 mile from exit 42 at approximatly 11:15 pm july 16, 1997 when my wife and i first spotted a cluster of lights in the sky about a couple of miles ahead of us. we first thought that it was a helicopter of some kind with search lights under as it seemed to be stationnary in the sky. but as we were appoaching the sighting, the cluster of lights did not look like anything we've ever seen on a helicopter. it was heading slowly toward the south-west and could not make a good description of it as it was too far. as we were trying to understand what we had just witnessed, i asked my wife to keep an eye on the ufo which was heading over the trees just in case it might be spotted again. as i was asking her, my eye caught another one on the north-east following the same path as the first. this time we were getting much closer as we kept on driving. the more i drove, the more we knew we were going to drive right over the craft. as it got closer we knew that this was something we had never seen before in our lives. as we were almost over it, we could finally make out the light pattern. it was 6 big round glowing white lights in a v shape. these big lights did not lit the ground, kind of a moon glow. there was a smaller white light at the front with 3 smaller white blinking lights beside it and a small pulsating red light in the middle of the craft. it made no noise, as our windows were pulled down because it was a hot and muggy night. it was not going very fast. it must have been about 100 to 200 feet over us. we had a hard time making out the triangle dark craft itself as the 6 big lights were overshadowing the structure but could tell it was a solid craft. once it had past over our car, we pulled over and looked at it until we lost sight of it. there were other cars on the highway who also witnessed these crafts but none stopped. thank you ever so much for your time!
content.summary: 2 triangle shape objects slowly following the other heading south-west about 1 mile from exit 42 on highway i-91 between hartford, conn. and springfield, ma.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 546am this morning, i felt compelled to grab my binoculars and look at stars. in the northwest sky i spotted a ultra white orb that flew in a southeast direct. watched it for about 3 minutes until it was gone. my heart is racing damn that was freaky.
content.summary: Bright white orb

content.detailedDescription: I do believe i was either visited or abducted i remember nothing but woke up with a small 1/4 " cut right at the top of my thumb thing is i do have a problem with that thumb but on the other side. it appears that a surgeon went in from the top maybe to probe or diagnose it but no work was preformed. this all started after i witnessed a huge triangle ufo a few months ago. i dont know what to do but i no longer fear them.
content.summary: I woke up today with a stange cut on top of my hand

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Delivering pizzas in the arcadia neighborhood, i glanced up and saw three distant, glowing red lights approaching from the sw horizon. they really grabbed my attention. they were high in the sky, distanced from each other but single-file, moving nw at normal passenger plane's pace. it was nighttime -- black starry sky. at first i figured they were planes but as the first one grew closer, it struck me as odd. it didn't have the typical separated (blinking) lights you would see under a plane. it seemed as though it was one mass of reddish-orange light -- all three of them did -- flickering sort of like a fire. a little bit excited, i pulled into the cul-de-sac, parked my car and got out to get a better view. i listened for the sound of a plane but i heard nothing. the second light passed overhead thirty seconds after the first, followed by the third one thirty seconds after that. by the time the third light was overhead, the first one's light faded out well before it reached the nw horizon. as the other two moved, they both faded out when they reached the same place the first one did. there may have been a cloud at that position that they passed through, but since i could see stars in nearly every direction; something seemed off. it's been on my mind ever since, so i started researching similar things over the past couple weeks, and apparently fiery red lights are sometimes associated with ufos. they certainly didn't seem like planes and at no point could a i hear a sound possibly coming from any of them. so that brings me here. a very terrible ms paint drawing is attached showing their formation as they came over the horizon.
content.summary: Three distanced, fiery, reddish-orange lights passing nw over west kalamazoo, mi

content.detailedDescription: From www... "there is a friend of mine that started two companies inovatzia and inteli, corp. i believe they are based in ca . i personally saw them working on a similar phone and other devices. they were actually at the stage of testing them in his garage over a year ago ! the device they played with looked thiner and there where no pins or screws also the materials they used looked something like from space - light as plastic but had the look and feel of metal - when put together was similar to......... interestingly i couldn't see any openings on the components (like for mic or speakers) as far as i know they came up with some sort of new radical approach that enabled them to do all kind of stuff. however they are extremely secretive company and till recently wouldn't even update their website the name of the actual inventor that made it possible is stan petrov - he was a former electrician and mechanic. .... ....Him he was playing at his office in irvine with this crazy vintage 1930's phone they modified for a joke. it acted as hd sound system (super powerful -the sound quality was comparable to good size stereo -however i couldn't see any speakers ) it also worked as a regular phone dialing etc, it was cordless and could connect to any phone or pc. he told me that it lasted 150+ hours playing/talking ? i hope whoever reads this has a chance to meet him and with bit of luck see some of the stuff they came up with -he is....."
content.summary: They are here
